name: Invaders (itch) (Xubiod)
description:
My Opera GX Game Jam entry.

All assets (art, sound effects, music, and code) were made during the jam period, including a JavaScript extension to save to the browser. The extension has gotten a separate release on itch.

WASD to move, Q to throw by default.

All settings are saved to the browser, but not with the Windows build as of now.

Also available on GameJolt.
